parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition switch can cause the loss of essential electrical systems, including headlights, air conditioning, defroster, and anti-lock braking system (ABS), which can lead to accidents, especially at night or in low-visibility conditions.
symptoms: Intermittent or complete loss of headlights
and heater; parking brake light remains on; ABS system disabled; windshield wipers and interior fan malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission to shift gears properly can cause the vehicle to lose power, accelerate unexpectedly, or become stuck in a particular gear, leading to a loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The transmission fails to shift from one gear to the next
the transmission becomes stuck in a particular gear
the engine RPMs surge or reach unusually high levels.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Breather Valve and Mass Air Flow Sensor Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the breather valve and mass air flow sensor can cause engine problems, leading to poor performance, decreased fuel efficiency, and potentially even engine failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Water Ingress into Air Intake and Engine
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Water entering the air intake and engine can cause serious damage, including hydro locking, which can lead to costly repairs and potentially even engine failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Repair Service by Volkswagen Certified Dealership
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the dealership to properly diagnose and repair issues can lead to prolonged periods of vehicle downtime, increased risk of accidents, and decreased customer satisfaction.
symptoms: Repeated visits to the dealership are required to address the same issue
lack of communication from the dealership.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the ABS brake system can cause the brake pedal to become hard, leading to a loss of braking ability, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake pedal becomes very hard
the issue is more frequent in cold weather.
